notes.search_params_info: Leave empty strings to search all results. Fill in values to filter specific data.
notes.format_options: Use 'csv' for CSV format or 'excel' for Excel format
notes.filename_info: {date} will be replaced with current date and time
notes.max_pages_info: Set to 50 for testing. Change to 11848 or higher to scrape all data (will take hours!)
